name: Beyond Love
description:
This game was made in 48h for the Emotional Game Jam 2020. 

This is TEAM ROADSIDE's submission. 

Controls

ZQSD or arrow key to move

mouse to aim

left clic to shoot

right clic to grab someone

SPACE to jump over a friend

---
